home.title: WELCOME TO chon-ji school
home.subtitle: join over 9,000+ students
home.description: Taekwon-Do (TKD) is a Korean martial art that promotes physical abilities and character development. In addition to combat and defense techniques, it strengthens the body, improves endurance, speed, and performance. It encourages the development of willpower, self-discipline, and inner peace. The five principles are courtesy, integrity, perseverance, self-control, and indomitable spirit. Since 2023, we offer kick-boxing competitions as part of our program.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Let's know about our fight chon-ji school
about.description: The ITF Taekwon-Do School Chon-Ji was founded in 2020 and is a member of the I.T.F Switzerland Taekwon-Do Federation, Sport Basel, and since 2023, WAKO Switzerland. The founder and main coach, Ervin Begic, started his Taekwon-Do training at the age of ten in Bosnia-Herzegovina. He is a multiple gold medal winner at Bosnian championships, was part of the national team, and achieved 3rd place at the European Championships in 2011. He has also participated in world championships and was the national champion in Kick-Box, Light Contact in Bosnia-Herzegovina. He holds a 4th Dan black belt.

service.title: Services
service.subtitle: our schedule programs
service.description: I would love to introduce you to martial arts and share my knowledge, skills, and experience. The sport should primarily be fun, but I also want to motivate you to participate in competitions and pass belt exams. I teach children from 6 years old, teenagers, and adults

card-1.title: Taekwon-Do
card-1.subtitle: A session dedicated to deepening the understanding of Taekwondo Figures (Tuls)

card-2.title: Taekwon-Do + Kick-Boxing Techniques
card-2.subtitle: A session focused on techniques applicable in both Taekwon-Do and Kick-Boxing sparring

card-3.title: Conditioning
card-3.subtitle: A session aimed at enhancing endurance, strength, speed, agility, and mobility

footer.description: Chon-ji Taekwon-Do School is specialized in martial arts and fighting sports since 2020 and combines different teaching methods to offer high quality programs.
